original_text: Help from Egypt is useless! So I call Egypt ‘Rahab who does nothing.’ 30: Rahab was another name for Egypt. See Psalm 87:4. It was also the name for a monster that lived in the sea. Help from Egypt is useless! So I call Egypt ‘Rahab who does nothing.’
korean_text: 애굽의 도움은 헛되고 무익하니라 그러므로 내가 애굽을 가만히 앉은 라합이라 일컬었느니라

sentences.original_text: So I call Egypt 'Rahab who does nothing.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 이집트를 '아무것도 하지 않는 라합'이라 부른다.

sentences.original_text: Rahab was another name for Egypt.
It was also the name for a monster
So I call Egypt 'Rahab who does nothing.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 이집트를 '아무것도 하지 않는 라합'이라 부른다.
